main.title: Transforming Designs into Code. Full-Stack Web Developer.
main.about: I’m Matvey, a Front-End Developer specializing in React and TypeScript, based in Ukraine. With over 4 years of non-commercial experience and more than 6 months of commercial work, I excel at creating dynamic and engaging web experiences. My expertise includes crafting intuitive user interfaces, optimizing performance, and delivering high-quality code.

main.title: Frontend Developer specializing in the creation of high-quality websites and innovative user interfaces.
main.text1: I'm Matvey, a Front-End Developer with a deep-rooted passion for web development that began in high school. My journey started in 10th grade, where I first explored front-end development through HTML and CSS. By 11th grade, I had a solid grasp of these technologies and decided to pursue Computer Engineering at Kharkiv National University of Radio Electronics.
main.text2: During my university studies, I delved into key programming principles, including OOP and algorithms, and took various courses that expanded my knowledge of front-end development. I became proficient in JavaScript and familiarized myself with Git and version control systems, ultimately choosing React JS for further specialization. Currently, I am enhancing my skills in TypeScript and Redux Toolkit.
main.text3: I've gained hands-on experience through an internship at HARBOUR TECH ABI CRM LTD, working on a CRM system project tailored for the Spanish market. Additionally, I am employed part-time at Artic Web, where I contribute to the development of diverse web applications for various clients. With over 6 months of commercial experience and approximately 4 years of non-commercial work, I am committed to creating innovative and effective web solutions that meet both user needs and business objectives.

experience.title: Work Experiences
experience.role1: At Artic Web, I played a key role in developing web applications of varying complexities, leveraging technologies such as React JS, Tailwind CSS, and Redux Toolkit. During this period, I not only honed my technical skills but also significantly improved my soft skills, including communication, problem-solving, and teamwork. Additionally, I solidified my expertise in React JS, confidently applying advanced concepts and best practices in real-world commercial projects.
experience.role2: At HARBOUR TECH ABI CRM LTD, I contributed to the development of a CRM system tailored for the Spanish market, utilizing JavaScript, HTML, and SCSS, with the front-end seamlessly integrated into WordPress. This project also marked my first experience with the Husky commit system, which proved to be highly beneficial for collaborative work. I developed two key pages, which are showcased in my portfolio. This role provided me with invaluable experience, particularly through mentorship and interaction with more experienced developers, significantly shaping my growth as a front-end developer.
experience.role3: After completing my internship at HARBOUR TECH ABI CRM LTD, I was offered a position as a Frontend Developer. In this role, I have worked on various projects, including my most recent one, which focused on delivering exceptional construction services with an emphasis on quality, safety, and sustainability. This project, built with Next.js, incorporated libraries such as Mapbox, i18n, and SCSS. You can view the project here: Garcia Global. My work on this project has allowed me to apply advanced technical skills while contributing to the growth and success of our clients.

contacts.text: Feel free to reach out for projects, collaborations, or just to say hello! Currently seeking new opportunities.

pizza.text: Pizza Delivery is a convenient app that makes every order special. Delicious pizza is not just food, it is a small joy that brightens your day. Whether it is a cozy night at home, a party with friends, or an important event, our pizza is always the perfect choice.
descriptionText: ReactJS & TypeScript: The project is built using ReactJS for the front-end, coupled with TypeScript to ensure type safety and enhance code quality. React's component-based architecture allows for a dynamic and responsive user interface.

Redux Toolkit: State management is handled by Redux Toolkit, enabling efficient and predictable state updates throughout the application. This ensures that the user's experience remains smooth and consistent.
React Router: Navigation between different sections of the app is managed by React Router, allowing users to move seamlessly between pages without reloading the app.
Axios & Fetch: These libraries are utilized for handling API requests, enabling the app to communicate with the backend for fetching product data, submitting orders, and more.

CSS Modules & SCSS: Styling is implemented using CSS Modules combined with SCSS for modular and maintainable styles. This approach helps to avoid style conflicts and makes it easier to manage the application's look and feel.
React Content Loader: This library is used to display skeleton screens, enhancing the user experience by showing loading placeholders while the actual content is being fetched.
Code Splitting: To optimize performance, the application leverages code splitting, ensuring that only the necessary code is loaded when needed, which reduces the initial load time.
useWhyDidYouUpdate: A custom hook, useWhyDidYouUpdate, is used for debugging, helping to identify unnecessary re-renders and optimize component performance.

dlnure.text: DLNure Booking is a seamless platform that connects you to the best hotels for your perfect stay. Whether it is a luxurious getaway, a business trip, or a weekend escape, finding the ideal accommodation is effortless. With DLNure Booking, your next adventure is just a click away.
descriptionText: Next.js & TypeScript: The application is built with Next.js, a React framework that provides server-side rendering and static site generation capabilities. TypeScript is used for type safety and better developer experience.
Prisma: Prisma is used as an ORM for managing database interactions. It simplifies database operations and ensures type safety for database queries.
React Hook Form: This library is used for managing form state and validation, making it easier to handle complex forms in the application.
React-Select & React-Date-Range: These libraries enhance user experience with advanced select and date range components.
Leaflet & React-Leaflet: For interactive maps and location-based features, Leaflet and its React wrapper are used.
Next-Auth: This library handles authentication and authorization, providing a secure way to manage user sessions.
Tailwind CSS: Tailwind CSS is used for styling, offering a utility-first approach to building responsive and modern user interfaces.
React-Hot-Toast: This library provides a way to display toast notifications, improving user feedback and interaction.
Zustand: Zustand is used for state management, providing a simple and efficient way to handle global state.

airpods.text: AirPods Lending is your one-stop shop for the latest AirPods Pro. Whether you are upgrading your sound experience or trying out the latest tech, we have got the perfect pair for you. Discover seamless connectivity, top-tier sound quality, and a new way to enjoy your favorite audio.
descriptionText: HTML, CSS, JavaScript: The project is built using standard web technologies. HTML provides the structure, CSS handles the styling, and JavaScript manages interactivity.
BEM Methodology: The project uses the BEM (Block, Element, Modifier) methodology for CSS class naming, which enhances the readability and maintainability of the styles.

CSS Features: New CSS techniques such as the :has pseudo-class are utilized to manage styles dynamically based on the presence of child elements, allowing for advanced visual effects without additional JavaScript.
JavaScript: JavaScript is employed to handle interactive elements on the landing page, such as dynamic color selection and interactive buttons and links.

password.text: Random Password Generator is your reliable tool for creating secure and unique passwords. Whether you need protection for your accounts or extra security for your data, generate strong passwords with just a click. Keep your information safe with ease.
descriptionText: React: The project is built using React to create a dynamic and interactive user interface.
TypeScript: TypeScript is used to ensure type safety and improve the developer experience by catching errors early during development.
SCSS: SCSS is utilized for styling, providing a more manageable and scalable way to write CSS.
Framer Motion: This library is used for animations, enhancing the user experience with smooth transitions and effects.
React-Hot-Toast: This library is used for displaying toast notifications, providing feedback and alerts to users.
ESLint & Prettier: ESLint and Prettier are used for maintaining code quality and consistency, with a focus on best practices in TypeScript and React development.

sneakers.text: Sneakers Shop is your go-to destination for the latest in stylish sneakers. Whether you are looking for exclusive releases, timeless classics, or trendy designs, we have got you covered. Step up your sneaker game and find the perfect pair for any occasion.
descriptionText: React: The project is built with React, providing a dynamic and interactive user interface for browsing and purchasing sneakers.
TypeScript: TypeScript enhances code quality and developer experience by ensuring type safety and reducing bugs during development.
React Swiper: Swiper is utilized for creating responsive and touch-friendly carousels and sliders, enhancing the visual appeal of the sneaker listings.
React Context: React Context is employed for managing global state and passing data throughout the component tree without prop drilling.
SASS / CSS Modules: SASS and CSS Modules are used for styling, providing a modular and scalable approach to managing styles within the application.
Axios: Axios is used for making HTTP requests to interact with APIs and fetch data, such as sneaker listings and user information.

watch-store.text: Luxury Watch Store is your destination for timeless elegance and premium craftsmanship. Explore a curated selection of luxury watches that embody sophistication and style. Whether for a special occasion or everyday wear, find the perfect timepiece to elevate your look.
descriptionText: React: The application is built with React, providing a dynamic and responsive user interface for exploring and purchasing luxury watches.
TypeScript: TypeScript enhances code quality and development efficiency by adding type safety and reducing potential bugs.
Vite: Vite is used as the build tool and development server, offering fast build times and an optimized development experience.
Redux Toolkit: Redux Toolkit is employed for state management, simplifying state management tasks and providing powerful tools for handling application state.

Tailwind CSS: Tailwind CSS is utilized for styling, providing a utility-first approach to build modern and responsive designs.

vadaleos.text: Vadaleos is a professional real estate platform based in Prague, Czech Republic, designed for a company specializing in turnkey apartment sales. The website showcases high-quality renovated properties ready for immediate move-in, allowing clients to explore different design options and interior finishes according to their preferences. The platform provides an intuitive multi-page experience, optimized performance, and a modern visual style that reflects the brand’s premium positioning.
vadaleos.myRole: I was fully responsible for developing the front-end architecture of Vadaleos from the ground up — from initial setup to final deployment. My work included designing a scalable structure for the React application, implementing multilingual support with i18next for Czech and English languages, and ensuring strong SEO optimization and performance across all pages. I integrated complex form logic using EmailJS for lead submissions, built custom sliders with React Slick, and implemented smooth animations with Framer Motion for an engaging user experience. Additionally, I focused on seamless collaboration with the senior back-end developer to ensure stable API integration and overall system reliability. The result was a fast, polished, and production-ready website that met all client expectations and was successfully delivered on time.
descriptionText: ReactJS & TypeScript: The foundation of the front-end, providing a modular, maintainable, and performant architecture.
Vite: Used as the development and build environment for fast bundling and optimized deployment.
TailwindCSS: Employed for efficient and responsive styling, ensuring a clean and consistent UI across devices.
Framer Motion: Added smooth transitions and micro-animations to elevate the overall user experience.
i18next & React i18next: Implemented full multilingual support for Czech and English, including dynamic language detection and content management.
EmailJS: Integrated for form submission handling, allowing leads and client inquiries to be sent directly via email.
React Slick & Slick Carousel: Used for property sliders and interactive image galleries.
React Helmet Async: Ensured proper SEO configuration and dynamic metadata across all pages.
React Hot Toast: Added user-friendly notifications and feedback for form interactions and system actions.
React Router DOM: Enabled smooth navigation between multiple pages, maintaining a consistent and fast user experience.

bwt-group-logistics.text: BWT Group Logistics is a modern multi-page website designed to present a logistics and transportation company with a focus on professionalism and user convenience. The platform combines clear structure, responsive design, and smooth animations to create a dynamic and visually engaging experience for visitors.
bwt-group-logistics.myRole: I was fully responsible for the development of the BWT Group Logistics website from scratch — starting with layout creation, interface design, and implementation of all functionality. The entire UI/UX design was developed by me without pre-existing mockups, based solely on provided content and page structure. I implemented a complex multi-step lead form with dynamic validation and integrated it with EmailJS to send submissions directly via email for lead processing. I also worked on responsive layouts, SEO optimization, and added animated transitions using Framer Motion to make the site more interactive and professional.
descriptionText: ReactJS & TypeScript: Core technologies used to build a scalable and maintainable front-end with a component-based architecture.
Vite: Utilized as the development environment and build tool for fast and optimized project bundling.
TailwindCSS: Applied for building responsive layouts quickly and maintaining a clean, consistent design system.
Framer Motion: Used to implement animations and page transitions for a more engaging and modern user experience.
React Router DOM: Handles navigation across multiple pages, ensuring smooth routing and a seamless browsing flow.
React Slick & Slick Carousel: Implemented for sliders and carousels, enhancing the visual presentation of services and testimonials.
EmailJS: Integrated for sending form data directly to email, enabling efficient lead capture and communication.
React Helmet Async: Used for SEO optimization and dynamic metadata management.
React Hot Toast: Provides real-time visual feedback for form submissions and user actions.
React GTM Module: Integrated Google Tag Manager for analytics and tracking user behavior to improve marketing insights.

daiwo.text: DAIWO is an advanced web platform centered around cryptocurrency and digital investments. It provides an immersive 3D experience, interactive trading features, and informative sections such as the About and Investment pages. The project combines modern UI design with blockchain integration to deliver a professional and engaging user experience.
daiwo.myRole: My role in the DAIWO project involved optimizing performance and refactoring existing components to improve efficiency and maintainability. I was responsible for redesigning several core pages, including the About and Buy/Sell, enhancing their layout and adding smooth animations for a more dynamic feel. Additionally, I implemented the full logic for the Investment System page — including staking mechanics, percentage calculations, wallet connection integration, and interactive state management with accordions and user actions. Overall, my focus was on improving usability, interactivity, and code performance across the platform.
descriptionText: ReactJS & TypeScript: The core of the application is built with ReactJS for building dynamic interfaces and TypeScript for ensuring type safety and maintainability.
Vite: Used as the development and build tool, providing fast bundling and optimized production builds.
TailwindCSS & SCSS: Styling is implemented with TailwindCSS for utility-first design and SCSS for custom components, ensuring flexibility and modern aesthetics.
Three.js & React Three Fiber: Enables interactive 3D visuals, enhancing user engagement with immersive WebGL graphics.
@tanstack/react-query: Handles data fetching and caching efficiently, ensuring smooth updates and real-time data synchronization.
Framer Motion & Animate.css: Used to create smooth, visually appealing animations that improve user experience and add depth to the design.
Axios: Used for API communication, enabling secure and efficient interaction with external data sources.
Wagmi, Ethers.js & Web3: Integrated to support blockchain functionality, wallet connections, and crypto transactions.
EmailJS & React Hot Toast: Used for handling contact forms and user notifications with modern and responsive feedback.
Optimization & Code Splitting: Performance improvements were achieved by refactoring components, lazy-loading heavy elements, and compressing assets for faster loading.
